title: Interpretation of killing in a dream with a bullet

preview.html: Interpretation of killing in a dream with bullets: Murder is one of the most heinous crimes, and Islamic law has warned against the most dangerous killing, and the punishment for whoever kills intentionally is that his abode is Hell and eternal wrath, and the curse of God be upon him. Souls are not for humans, but souls are for God, and God Almighty has given them to people as a trust, and He will answer them after a while, so that Almighty God will consider men responsible for their actions, and are souls God’s? Only God can take it, but you can take it. This indicates that you are hostile to the king of these souls, and whoever resists the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between will not succeed. Interpretation of the vision of shooting a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is killing someone in a dream, then this person is also known to her. This is evidence that this person causes her many problems in her life, and she cannot actually prevent him from these actions. He forbade it in a dream. But if this person is unknown to that woman. This is evidence that worries and sorrows fill this woman’s life and that she cannot resist these worries in reality. You are getting rid of it in a dream and this is a sign for this girl that she should be patient and not be weak in facing the problems of her life. To enjoy a happy life, and if she sees in her dream an unmarried woman fighting a group of people. This indicates that they are not good at showing her love, but their hearts are full of hatred towards her. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is killing the one she loves, then she is killing the one she loves. This is evidence that this man had promised to marry her for a long time, and that this man had abandoned her once and then returned to her again, but she rejected this man. Why did he leave her? This is evidence of the intelligence of this woman who is not governed by emotion alone, despite her ability to manage her life’s affairs and control her emotions in order to live a decent life. Interpretation of seeing a divorced woman being killed in a dream: What if a divorced woman dreams that she is killing her ex-husband, do you see? This is evidence that this woman benefits greatly from her ex-husband, either by having an abundance of money, or by returning what was wrongfully stolen from her, and if the divorced woman sees that she will be killed. An acquaintance. This is evidence that there will be a common interest between her and this man, and that that interest may be a project in which they share profits. This is evidence that this woman will marry again to someone better than her ex-husband, but if it is her husband who is pursuing her. This is evidence of her husband’s desire to return to her, but she does not agree to him. Interpretation of seeing a married woman being killed in a dream: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is killing those she knows, then she will be killed. This is evidence that this man has caused her many problems in her life, and that she wants to get rid of him. If a married woman sees that she is killing her husband in a dream and regrets killing him, this is evidence of that. This woman's life is full of problems and difficulties and she will soon separate from her husband. If a married woman dreams that her husband is trying to kill her. This is evidence of her husband’s lack of trust in her, and this is evidence of the necessity of presenting all evidence of her steadfastness and the extent of her honesty towards him.

title: What is oral communication, what are its types, and what are its most important skills

preview.html: What is oral communication, what are its types, and what are its most important skills? There are many types of social communication that a person uses to be able to communicate with the people around him. One of the most important and most widely used of these methods is oral communication. After studying this method of communication, it has been used in many Areas such as marketing, communicating with scientists and workers, and understanding their desires. In this article, we will learn together what oral communication is, what its types are, and what its most important skills are. The concept of oral communication is vocal communication between individuals through the use of sounds and vocabulary to express themselves, and we find that verbal communication differs from non-verbal communication, which relies on gestures, movements, and signs. Also known as verbal communication, it expresses the method of sending messages from the sender to the recipient using words and vocabulary in order to ensure that the recipient understands the content and meaning of the message directly and immediately. Defining the extent of oral communicationVerbal communication can be defined as a process through which feelings and thoughts are mediated The information that the sender wants to convey to the receiver through a medium through which ideas, knowledge, and process behaviors such as signs and faces are transmitted. Expressions. This process depends on the use of verbal and non-verbal messages in order to convey the desired meaning, and in order for it to be understood, it is necessary to distinguish between verbal and non-verbal signals and to use and learn the persuasive method. From the hadith. The best skills in addition to analyzing the future of the message. This type of communication is characterized by the fact that the recipient of the message remains in memory and cannot be modified or deleted. Types of internal oral communication This type of communication is between him and him. It is an interpersonal type in which a person talks to himself and expresses everything that he cannot reveal to others, moreover, he can re-examine himself about his actions and words throughout the day. Interpersonal communicationIt is communication between two people using telephone conversations or face-to-face encounters, and the sender is in this type It is the person speaking and the message for the subject of the conversation between the two people, while the recipient is the listener. Small group communication is communication between family members or a group of friends, such that the number of people is small and the conversation is responsive to each other, and thus we find each person speaking at some time and being a listener to another, and so on, And so on. The person is the sender and receiver in this type of communication. Public communication appears to the general public and they do not need to be related to each other. We find it in conferences, meetings, and group interviews, such as holding a meeting in a company with the aim of finding solutions to some of the company’s problems. Basic contact information The sender: is the person who speaks and wants to convey a certain idea to the other person. The message: is the content that the sender wants to convey to the recipient. Message channel Recipient: The method and means used by the sender to complete the communication process. Recipient: The person to whom the message is addressed

title: Interpretation of seeing the color green in a dream and green clothes in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the color green, whether it is a shirt dress, a dress for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a single man, or a married man, by Ibn Sirin and by Imam al-Sadiq, green. Interpretation of the color green in a dream. Seeing the color green in a dream. Green is one of the colors that gives comfort and peace just by seeing it, so imagine that you are in a rural land. And a green space alone, how do you feel? In fact, you will feel comfortable and calm immediately, and therefore seeing the color green in a dream is no different from it in reality, as it is a color that gives the viewer calm and confidence, and we will then mention the interpretation of the vision. It is the green color in a dream in detail. Interpretation of the green color in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing the color green in a dream means the coming of kindness, good news, or life encounters. Interpretation of the green color in a man’s dream. The green color in a man’s dream, whether he is single or married, shows the character of that good man and his noble origin. And his bright future, full of success and the coming of a year full of happiness, goodness, and profit, or marriage if he is single, fulfills desires and achieves goals. Interpretation of the color green in one dream. If an unmarried or unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a beautiful green dress, this means that this year will be a year of kindness. She can achieve what she wants, such as succeeding in studies, and gaining prestige. Work, engagement, courtship, or marriage. An unmarried girl who sees the color green in one of her personal items, such as a shoe or a bag, is a sign of success and many aspirations and wishes, and a beautiful green dress is a sign of purity, faith, and purity. Interpretation of the color green in a married woman’s dream: Seeing the color green is considered In a married woman’s dream, it is a good thing because it is an indicator that expresses happiness, joy, news, or happy events. A married woman seeing green dresses symbolizes the success and excellence of her children or livelihood and welcoming her husband. Interpretation of the color green in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for a pregnant woman who sees the color green in her dream, it is a sign of goodness and blessings in her life and in the life of the newborn, as it announces to her that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Whether you see him in her clothes or in bed... with kindness and blessings. Interpretation of green clothes in a dream. Scientists said that seeing yourself buying a piece of green cloth or clothes in a dream indicates the arrival of a new stage in your life full of goodness, happiness and success, which will be a reward for you after the fatigue and effort that you have endured. Vision A man in a dream wearing green clothes indicates marriage if he is single, and it indicates sustenance, success, earning, or travel if he is married. Also, seeing green clothes or cloth in the dreamer’s dream is a sign of recovery if he is sick and good news of the disappearance of worries, God willing. Interpretation of the House Green in a dream: The dreamer seeing his green house in a dream is an indication of the justice of the people of this house and a symbol of calm, stability, and the collapse of disputes. This interpretation applies to seeing the home’s furniture, furnishings, and walls as if they were green. Interpretation of a green car in a dream.

This interpretation applies to seeing the home’s furniture, furnishings, and walls as if they were green. Interpretation of a green car in a dream.

title: What is the interpretation of begging and crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi?

preview.html: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing begging and crying in a dream? The interpretation of begging and crying in a dream is completely different, and there are many things that affect it, such as the place to which the dreamer was praying and whether elements appeared after prayer, such as the division of the sky or rain, all of these Things must be interpreted in order for the dreamer to know the meaning of the dream, so follow the following paragraphs to know the interpretation in detail. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of begging and crying in a dream. The believer in reality is the one who turns to God when circumstances bother him and he feels wronged and tired, and then Whoever sees that he is calling to God, crying and begging Him to remove his sadness, then he is one of the pious people who have perfected it. He put his trust in God, and thanks to his heart full of love for the Most Merciful, he stands with him, supports him, and saves him from his troubles. But if the dreamer escapes the scope of religiosity and worship and lives life as if it were eternal and satisfies his desires by any means he wants, and he is witnessed by crying and invoking the Lord of the Worlds, then this is a good sign indicating that he will be one of Repentants who will soon draw near to God. If the dreamer is struggling in his waking life, and suffering is heavy on him, and he finds nothing that conveys hope and positive energy to his heart, and he dreams that he is crying and asking the Creator to comfort his affairs, then the dream has a positive meaning and indicates that the goal It will come true and ambitions will come true, especially if evidence confirms this such as the following: Or not: Heavy rain without floods or heavy rain, with the dreamer feeling happy in the dream. Second: If the dreamer prays to his Lord at dawn and sees the sun rising and filling his house with lights and joy. Third: If he sees a tree growing quickly after his prayer to God, then this symbol is beneficial to poor dreamers or debtors because it shows the good that will come without waiting. Interpretation of begging and crying in a dream by Ibn Sirin Life is not devoid of gains and losses, and no matter how much he loses and regrets it before, he will gain later, God willing. When the prisoner turns to his Lord, raises his hand to him in a dream, and calls him with tears streaming from his eyes and asks him to release him from prison, the scene shows his innocence and his release. Thus.Calling to God is a sign of honor and freedom from adversity and adversity, but if the dreamer prays to someone other than God in his dream, this indicates his submission to someone, and makes him control him because he is afraid of his authority. But this humiliation will not solve his crisis and he will continue to fear that person, but if he turns to the Lord of the Worlds, He will give him strength, raise his status, and make him the master of his decisions, and he does not allow anyone to offend him, nor hurt his feelings. If the dreamer sits inside a cave or a far away room About people and prayed to God and called out to him with a heart full of faith, knowing that he is already married, then this is good news for the birth of a son who has strong qualities such as religiosity, commitment, strength of character and more. Interpretation of supplication and crying in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq said: If the dreamer beseeches his Lord and cries and slaps his clothes and tears His clothes are due to intense sadness, so the dream is...

title: Interpretation of seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream: By seeing Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream, there is no doubt that there are people who dream of presidents or people of social status in our time, so we will present on the site a different interpretation of seeing Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream in this article.Interpretation Seeing the Saudi Crown Prince in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees the heir in her dream, her life with her future partner will be happy and peaceful. If the Crown Prince presents her with a golden ring, this indicates that she will get engaged soon. If an unmarried girl sees the Crown Prince Muhammad bin Salman in a dream, this is good news for her, as it is an indication that she will marry a man who has a high status and good reputation in society. If a girl sees that the heir is wearing elegant white clothes, this is a sign that she will marry someone. If she sees the heir proposing to her A bottle of perfume, a watch, or a key, this symbolizes that God Almighty will open the doors of livelihood for her. But if the heir gives her a gift, this indicates that he will reach his high academic position or that he will obtain a high and prestigious position that he desires. But if the girl sees that the heir is feeding Honey or grapes, this is a sign of many livelihoods and good things that you will gain in reality, and the rest of the food has a good interpretation. Interpretation of seeing the Caliph in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing Prince Muhammad bin Salman in a dream in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her wishes will come true. Soon or her life will change, change and improve. Seeing a pregnant woman with an heir in a dream means that God will give her a new child who will have an excellent position and a home in the future. If the woman is pregnant and sees the heir in her dream, this is a sign from God Almighty that she will have a son. But if A pregnant woman sees that her successor is giving her her jewelry, as this is evidence that God Almighty is blessing her with a female. What is the interpretation of seeing the Saudi Crown Prince in a dream: Seeing the Crown Prince, Prince Mohammed bin Salman, in a dream is considered a good and praiseworthy vision, because it indicates goodness, life, and blessing. And whoever sees that the heir He sleeps next to him, this is a sign that evil will defeat him. The dream of an heir also indicates a transformation of the situation and its change from poverty to wealth and from distress to comfort. If one sees a crown prince other than the country in which he lives, this is evidence of travel from which he derives great benefits and an abundant life. And if He saw the Caliph in his dream frowning at his face and turning away from him, then this indicates that the person with the insight has committed a shameful act or disobeyed him. And whoever sees that his Caliph has come to him in his house and sits and talked with him, this is evidence of God’s satisfaction with him and His blessing on his work. Interpretation of the vision of the Crown Prince Saudi Arabia in a married woman’s dream: If a married woman sees Prince Mohammed bin Salman in a dream, this represents her husband or son, indicating that her husband will have a good job or that her son will have a bright future. Also, a married woman’s vision of the heir is evidence that her life She is stable and happy with her husband and children. If a married woman sees that the heir gave her a gift, then...

title: A detailed interpretation of an apology in a dream

preview.html: And here in this article, the detailed interpretation of regret in a dream, one of the noble qualities that every person should have is to offer it with regret when he commits any mistake, and this act is evidence that its owner has great morals and reconciles with himself. And when someone sees in his dream that he is apologizing to someone or vice versa, he feels confused because he does not know what his dream means and whether its interpretation brings good or evil, so the jurists of interpretation wanted to give it. A clear meaning for this dream and through the following lines in the encyclopedia we will present the vision of presenting sadness in a dream. Interpretation of an apology in a dream Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream of an apology The interpreter Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees in a dream that he is apologizing to someone, this means that this person in reality feels guilty and remorseful. And this dream is a message to its owner about the need to review his mistakes and reconcile with those who wronged him. Interpretation of an apology in a dream for a single woman An apology in the dream of an unmarried girl symbolizes reconciliation after the offender admits his guilt. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is asking her parents to forgive her, her dream indicates that she obeys them in reality. But if she sees in her dream that she is asking her lover to forgive her, this means that she will hurt her. Whoever sees in her dream that she is asking her friend or relative to forgive her, this means that they will reconcile in reality and that all the differences that arose between them will be resolved. The single dream of a man apologizing to her indicates that he will get money or benefit from this person. One of the auspicious dreams for a girl who has never been married is to dream of two people apologizing to each other Some, because it is a sign of changing circumstances for the better and the coming of good. Interpretation of seeing a request for forgiveness in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream that she is apologizing for a mistake she made, her dream indicates that she will receive grace and forgiveness in reality. Whoever sees in her dream that she is asking her husband to forgive her, this means that their relationship is characterized by stability and harmony. However, if she dreams that her husband is the one asking her to forgive him, this is evidence of the stability of their marital life and her benefit from him. Seeing a married woman asking her brother’s permission is considered a praiseworthy dream, because it indicates that the dreamer will soon achieve profits and benefits that may be inherited from her relatives. Interpretation of a dream of an apology from a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman dreams that she is asking her husband to forgive her, her dream indicates the collapse of the problems between them and the stability of their life. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her husband apologizes to her, this is good news that she will benefit from him, and it also indicates that she will give birth easily. Interpretation of seeing a request for forgiveness in a man’s dream One of the auspicious dreams for a man is his dream of asking for forgiveness and forgiveness; Because it means that he is able to repent and pay off his debt if he owes it, and recover from his illness. Whoever sees in a dream that he apologizes to his enemy, his dreams indicate that he feels weak in reality and that he cannot control the course of his life. Interpretation of a dream of someone apologizing to you If a married woman dreams that someone asks her, this is good news that she will soon hear the good news, remove her worries, and her salvation

title: Interpretation of eating grapes in a dream and its relationship to money and power

preview.html: Many scholars have interpreted the vision of eating grapes in a dream, and most interpretations indicate the abundance of halal food and the restoration of circumstances and changing them for the better, as each interpretation of the dream indicates the signs that come in a dream to the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a dream about eating grapes in a dream. There are different interpretations of eating grapes in a dream, and each interpretation is different from the other, whether it is a good vision or a bad vision. We will provide these interpretations through a different website: If one sees in a dream that he is eating white grapes and the dreamer is sick, then this vision indicates a speedy recovery for him. If a man says in a dream that he is eating green grapes, then this vision indicates that he will be promoted at work to A prestigious position. Eating grapes in a dream is beneficial for the dreamer, as he will obtain a lot of money and livelihood of all kinds. If a married woman dreams that she is eating grapes from the top of a tree, then this vision may indicate the entry of happiness into her home, stability from her husband, and a quiet life. Eating grapes from a tree, and this vision indicates that the dreamer is seeking a specific goal and that it will be achieved for him, and God knows best. Eating black grapes in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will face some problems and a watery period with problems and responsibilities. And if someone sees that he is eating black grapes early This indicates that he is subjected to injustice a lot and that he will suffer from major problems from which he will not get out easily. Eating grapes in a dream is a bad person with bad morals, so the dream shows that he is doing forbidden things and drinking alcohol, and the vision is a warning to him. If a person dreams that there is a dead person in relation to the one who eats grapes in a dream This dream shows the good ending for the dead person and the situation he is in now, and it will be a beautiful situation. Also, if someone sees in a dream that the dead person is eating grapes, it means that there is an inheritance behind that deceased person and he will obtain it. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress in a dream according to Ibn Sirin And Nabul will eat yellow grapes in a dream. Seeing grapes that are yellow in a dream indicates the dreamer’s illness. Eating grapes before they appear in a dream indicates a serious illness affecting the dreamer. Eating yellow grapes at the time of their appearance indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money. Yellow grapes indicate In a dream, it also indicates small problems that bother the dreamer, but she finds solutions for them. If one dreams that he is feeding someone with yellow grapes, then this dream indicates that that person is sick or suffering from severe distress. Eating red grapes in a dream Eating red grapes in a dream indicates achieving Some goals for the dreamer, but there are some minor changes. Interpretation of a dream about eating grapes in a dream and the skin of grapes is thick. If a man dreams that he is eating red grapes, this dream indicates that he will get a new job that is better than his old one. If someone says in a dream that he is eating Grapes, but grapes are not chewed easily, then this dream shows the many responsibilities that the dreamer bears. If the merchant sees in his dream that he is eating red grapes, then this vision indicates the many profits that the dreamer will achieve. If he dreams

title: Interpretation of seeing a dove flying in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pigeons flying in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Pigeons are among the well-known birds that are widespread in various countries of the world, and there are many types and shapes of pigeons that can live in different environments. Seeing pigeons in a dream is one of the recurring dreams for many people because they often see Pigeons in real life and this can have other interpretations. In this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a pigeon flying in a dream according to the interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dove in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees a dove running towards him and landing on his shoulder This dream is good news for him that he will attain many good things. But if he sees pigeons flying over him, or sees himself slaughtering pigeons or brutally catching them, then this is evidence of failure in his affairs and his inability to achieve what he wants. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a white dove flying in a dream: An unmarried girl Seeing a white dove in her dream portends an imminent marriage. Seeing white dove eggs foretells the dreamer that he will obtain a lot of money, and this may mean that he will profit from his business, be promoted at work, or obtain a new job that will bring him a better income. Whoever sees that a white dove enters His house, then this is good news for him that good news will come to him soon. A pregnant woman who sees a dove in her dream is a good omen that she will give birth to her child easily, and will not have problems with childbirth. If she sees a dove laying a large egg, this means that God Almighty will give her a son, and if the egg is small, this means that God is giving her a female. Whoever sees a white dove flying, this is good news that he will obtain happiness, joy and joy in his life, and good news is that God will give him love. It fills his heart with happiness. Seeing a dove flying and landing over the house means that this person is waiting for someone who has been absent from him for a long time, and the return of this absent person is near. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a black dove in a dream: Whoever sees a black dove in his dream, this indicates problems and disagreements that occur between the dreamer and his partner. One of the warning dreams for an unmarried girl is to see a black dove. Does this mean that a reckless young man will propose to her? Therefore, she must beware of this young man because he will fill her life with misery and will not be a good husband for her. And if someone sees a black dove in his dream or a married woman sees him, This is a sign of the dreamer’s separation from his life partner through divorce. Seeing black pigeon feathers indicates disbelief. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a slaughtered dove in a dream: Whoever dreams of slaughtering in his pajamas, this indicates disagreement and problems that the dreamer suffers from. If a person sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a dove, this indicates On the problems he will face at work or in his life. But it is different for a single young man if he sees himself slaughtering a pigeon in a dream. Is this true? Good news for him that God Almighty will bless him with a good wife of good character and religion who will protect him and his home. A married woman who sees herself slaughtering pigeons indicates that this wife will suffer from delayed childbearing if she has not given birth yet. It's a message to her

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wasp and wasp sting in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a wasp, which is a flying insect, and has many colors. The wasp is yellow, black, and red, and it seems that the wasp is chasing me, or a wasp and bee sting for a married lover. For pregnant women, for divorced women, for men, according to Ibn Sirin, and more explanations in the continuation of the topic below. Interpretation of seeing a drone in a dream from the series Interpretation of seeing animals in a dream by Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him. Interpretation of a wasp in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin says that seeing a wasp in a dream is not a good thing and can indicate Destruction, devastation, loss of friends and money. A wasp in a dream indicates enemies that they do not like and do not love. Killing wasps in a dream indicates a way out of a financial problem and many crises. Also, seeing wasps indicates separation from friends, loss of friends, and distance from loved ones. If a girl sees a wasp in her dream and it approaches her and does not sting her, This indicates that there is a problem and it will be solved. If a divorced woman sees wasps or wasps in her dream, this means that there is a discussion about them. The fact is that the yellow wasp in a dream harms unmarried women, as it indicates an evil and harmful fiancé, and indicates her mistreatment. If one sees a wasp or A wasp in his dream, if he kills a wasp in his dream, it means that he can obtain and assert his rights. A wasp in a dream is an evil, hateful person who is unloving to people and continues to harm you and will not leave you alone. A girl who saw a wasp in her dream or in her dream sees that she was stung by a wasp Or she flees to the hornet's house, where she is among the people who want to slander her and speak falsely about her. And they are waiting for it. Whoever kills wasps is a wise person with sound judgment and strong determination who will defeat his enemies. It also indicates the ability of insight to protect himself and the rights of those around him. Seeing wasps also indicates the loss of close friends and loved ones, as well as the material loss of money and property. There is another opinion that says that seeing wasps in a dream is one of the best visions that every person wants to see in his sleep. Seeing wasps in the dream of a married man, even a single young man. A simple vision far from a wasp sting or a hornet attack for a married man or a single young man, this vision shows the great goodness that will come to him, God willing, the Blessed and Most High. And if a married man or an unmarried young man sees that the hornet is circling around him as if it were a circle of hornets and he is standing in the middle of it. This vision indicates the opening of a new job, job opportunity, or job. As for seeing wasps in a dream, it is a vision worthy of praise and indicates success and excellence. A wasp attack in a dream about the marriage of single young men. Every young man sees that there is a wasp attacking him. This vision indicates marriage. Escaping from a wasp in a dream means success at work. A wasp sting in a dream indicates superiority and marriage for unmarried people and the fulfillment of a wish for married people. A married woman who sees a wasp in a dream is good luck and a happy life due to its speed. The vision also indicates the fulfillment of something hoped for. For a woman For a married woman, a wasp in a dream indicates livelihood, money, kindness, and blessing. Seeing a wasp attack in a dream for a woman
